A friend I respect a lot. You're a really nice guy whom I enjoy taking to. I

replies.body:
As a person you were extremely toxic to me for a long damn time. You attacked me at every opportunity which was unneeded. But, you made an apology post which I still don't know whether to accept but you seem to be alright now.

Good player with a sword, can't remember the last time we fought and.talented objective player.
